Event.Address: Church of Ascension Hall on Beaufort Road, Ealing W5 3EB
Event.Maindescription:
Temples of South India

Events
1:00 pm : Assembly
1:30 pm : Temples of South India Presentation by Mr. Veda Narayanan
3:00 pm : Nibbles and Tea

And all this is for FREE !!! for SIS members only (who have paid their subscription for the year 2011)

Please send RSVP by 27th of May , by sending an e-mail to sisnambalava@gmail.com

SIS Trustees
